mapper.select: select ssimli.id, ssimli.library_name, ssimli.library_img, ssimli.library_content, ssimli.remark, ssimli.created_by, ssimli.created_time, ssimli.modified_by, ssimli.modified_time, ssimlic.id classId, ssimlic.code, ssimlic.name, ssimlic.sequence, ssimlic.remark classRemark, ssimlic.created_by classCreatedBy, ssimlic.created_time classCreatedTime, ssimlic.modified_by classIdModifiedBy, ssimliic.modified_time classIdModifiedTime from sys_sign_in_mood_library_info ssimli left join sys_sign_in_mood_library_info_in_classification ssimliic on ssimliic.mood_library_info_id = ssimli.id and ssimliic.is_deleted = 0 left join sys_sign_in_mood_library_info_classification ssimlic on ssimlic.id = ssimliic.classify_id and ssimlic.is_deleted = 0 where ssimli.id = #{id} and ssimli.is_deleted = 0
